title: Optimizing the Effectiveness of Blended Learning-Based Mobile Microlearning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and leadership experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning design for language competency enhancement targeting corporate managers/leaders, combining mobile-based microlearning and mandatory online assessment activities in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate the effectiveness of required/optional activities in blended learning design with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can identify and apply three or more learner engagement prediction indicators in mobile environments.
Learners can design two personalized learning strategies for at-risk learners, including those in the "murky middle."
Learners can propose methods for linking learning outcomes when developing a project-based assessment system.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
